anime.name: Fairy Tail
anime.creator: Hiro Mashima
anime.summary: Natsu and his cat Happy have traveled to the town of Hargeon in search of a dragon known as Igneel.There they run into Lucy, a young wizard who isdetermined to join the Fairy Tail Guild. Lucymeets a wizard claiming to be the famous Salamander of Fairy Tail, who uses his charms to trick young women into coming aboard his ship so he can kidnap them. Lucy nearly falls into the same trap, but Natsu rescues her and reveals himself to be the real Salamander, inviting herto join Fairy Tail.
